user_story: As an eager new graduate, I want an interactive checklist with progress tracking so that I can see exactly what tasks I've completed and what's still pending to avoid missing important deadlines.
acceptance_criteria: Display a visual checklist with checkboxes for all onboarding tasks
Show completion percentage prominently on the dashboard
Mark completed tasks with timestamps
Highlight overdue or upcoming deadline tasks in different colors
Allow users to check off completed items with immediate visual feedback

user_story: As a career switcher with limited time, I want smart task prioritization so that I can focus on the most critical items first and maximize my efficiency during onboarding.
acceptance_criteria: Automatically sort tasks by priority based on deadlines and dependencies
Display priority levels (High, Medium, Low) with visual indicators
Show estimated time to complete each task
Reorder tasks dynamically as deadlines approach
Allow manual priority adjustments when needed

user_story: As a remote executive, I want role-based task customization so that I only see onboarding tasks relevant to my senior position and don't waste time on entry-level requirements.
acceptance_criteria: Filter tasks based on job role and seniority level
Hide irrelevant tasks for executive positions
Include executive-specific compliance and strategic onboarding items
Allow HR to customize task lists per role type
Display role-appropriate content and resources

user_story: As an eager new graduate, I want step-by-step tutorials with visual guides so that I can learn complex processes independently without constantly asking colleagues for help.
acceptance_criteria: Provide video tutorials for complex onboarding tasks
Include screenshots with highlighted areas for each step
Allow users to pause, rewind, and replay tutorial content
Offer text-based alternatives to video content
Track tutorial completion and comprehension

user_story: As a career switcher balancing family responsibilities, I want a mobile-responsive design so that I can complete onboarding tasks during commutes or breaks when I'm away from my computer.
acceptance_criteria: Ensure all features work seamlessly on mobile devices
Optimize touch interactions for mobile screens
Maintain full functionality across desktop, tablet, and mobile
Sync progress across all devices in real-time
Design mobile-first interface elements

feature: Live chat integration with HR support
user_story: As a remote executive, I want live chat integration with HR support so that I can quickly resolve onboarding questions without scheduling formal meetings that interrupt my busy schedule.
acceptance_criteria: Provide instant messaging capability with HR team
Show online status of available support staff
Route questions to appropriate department specialists
Maintain chat history for reference
Offer escalation to phone/video calls when needed

user_story: As an eager new graduate who's anxious about missing deadlines, I want automated reminders via email and mobile notifications so that I never forget important onboarding tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Send email reminders 3 days, 1 day, and 2 hours before deadlines
Push mobile notifications for urgent tasks
Allow users to customize reminder frequency and channels
Include task details and direct links in reminder messages
Stop reminders automatically when tasks are completed

user_story: As a career switcher with limited time, I want digital document upload with auto-validation so that I can submit required documents correctly the first time without delays from formatting errors.
acceptance_criteria: Accept multiple file formats (PDF, JPG, PNG, DOC)
Automatically validate file size and format requirements
Provide immediate feedback on document acceptance or rejection
Show clear error messages with correction instructions
Allow drag-and-drop file uploads

user_story: As a remote executive, I want a real-time progress dashboard so that I can quickly assess my onboarding status and plan my time effectively around remaining requirements.
acceptance_criteria: Display overall completion percentage prominently
Show breakdown of progress by category (HR, IT, Training, etc.)
Highlight next priority actions clearly
Provide estimated time to complete remaining tasks
Update progress indicators in real-time

feature: Team introduction modules with photos and bios
user_story: As a remote executive, I want team introduction modules with photos and bios so that I can quickly learn about key stakeholders and build relationships despite not meeting them in person.
acceptance_criteria: Display team member photos, names, and roles
Include brief professional bios and contact information
Organize team members by department and reporting structure
Provide direct messaging or email contact options
Update team information automatically when changes occur

user_story: As an eager new graduate, I want gamification elements with progress celebrations so that completing onboarding tasks feels rewarding and motivating rather than overwhelming.
acceptance_criteria: Award badges for completing task categories
Display progress bars with milestone celebrations
Show completion animations and congratulatory messages
Track and display achievement streaks
Provide shareable completion certificates

user_story: As a career switcher who needs to maximize efficiency, I want single sign-on integration so that I don't waste time managing multiple passwords and can access all onboarding tools seamlessly.
acceptance_criteria: Enable login with company credentials across all integrated systems
Eliminate need for separate passwords for onboarding tools
Automatically authenticate users for connected applications
Maintain security standards for SSO implementation
Provide fallback authentication methods if SSO fails
